overview: They should be spending their time in prayerful contemplation, but to be honest this collection of horned-up priests really couldn’t give a fuck about the more spiritual aspect of life. Instead it’s carnality all the way – as Father Filip Bethsaida (Tomas Decastro) quickly discovers when he visits this refuge for wayward souls. Needless to say, the handsome stud fits in perfectly; as a bevy of cock-hungry, spunk-lusty boy-babes – Lucas Drake and Angel Lopez included – put chastity very much to one side for a jizz-loaded adventure that leaves no hole unplugged and no dick undrained. The result? A taste of twink heaven!
title: Kneel And Pray
